title: Forbes ranking of the 10 richest people in Italy 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The difference of Wealth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 21.1.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has the highest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars and Ennio Doris has the lowest Wealth in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
Wealth in billion U.S. dollars at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio is 24.4 , second place is  at 24.4, and thirdly is Giorgio Armani at 11.2.
Overall Wealth in billion U.S. dollars has lowered over the Months.
The Month Ennio Doris tends to be 2.43 percent lower than average.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is 100.3 if we add up values of all Months.
